textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Eberjey, which means "joy" in an obscure Nigerian dialect, was born from the belief that clothing worn close to the heart should express happiness, love, and confidence. All the things that make a woman truly beautiful. Tired of lingerie that confines women to unnatural ideas of standard beauty, founders Ali Mejia and Mariela Rovito created a line of carefully designed, pretty pieces in joyful colors and patterns that flatter real bodies and feel good, too. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
